title: Iris Flower Classification using Voting Classifier
description: In this lab, we will use Scikit-Learn's VotingClassifier to predict the class of iris flowers based on two features. We will compare the predictions of DecisionTreeClassifier, KNeighborsClassifier, and SVC classifiers individually, and then use VotingClassifier to combine their predictions and see if we get better results.

meta.title: Iris Flower Classification with Voting Classifier
meta.description: Explore machine learning techniques to predict iris flower class using Scikit-Learn's VotingClassifier.
meta.keywords: iris flower, classification, voting classifier, machine learning, scikit-learn
